data.actual_result: The user/bot shows as not talking until they stop and start talking again.
data.expected_result: The user/bot will show as talking
data.short_description: [Overlay] Accounts which are contently talking prior and after opening overlay do not light up.
data.steps_to_repro: - Get someone to contently have their Microphone Active, or use a Music bot with a song that's kinda long. - Open a game with Overlay - Observe the current people current people talking in voice
